mapper.sql: id, `path`, `name`, description, remarks, req_params_example, res_params_example, version, business_area, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into AS_API_CSR (`path`, `name`, description, remarks, req_params_example, res_params_example, version, business_area, create_time, update_time) values (#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{resParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update AS_API_CSR
`path` = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
req_params_example = #{reqParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
res_params_example = #{resParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_area = #{businessArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update AS_API_CSR set `path` = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, req_params_example = #{reqParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, res_params_example = #{resParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_area = #{businessArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into AS_API_CSR (`path`, `name`, description, remarks, req_params_example, res_params_example, version, business_area, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.reqParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.resParamsExample,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
select
from AS_API_CSR where version=#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id
select version, count(1) as total, max(update_time) as lastUpdateTime from AS_API_CSR GROUP BY version order by version desc
select business_area as businessArea, count(1) as total, max(update_time) as lastUpdateTime from AS_API_CSR GROUP BY business_area
